thread.section_title: Right Channel Radios Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Right Channel Radios | www.rightchannelradios.com
thread.title: Rick Mullin
thread.title_full: Right Channel Radios reviewed by Rick Mullin

author: Rick Mullin
title: Rick Mullin
text: Ordered this CB package for my Jeep JK. Everything arrived as ordered, and when I had some questions regarding the antenna calibration procedure they answered the phone quickly, knew the answer to my problem (nothing wrong with the merchandise, just my installation), and were very friendly and polite. I am very happy with both the product and the service.
